code.title: Code
code.description: The code that represents the rule or type of issue

messageText.title: Message Text
messageText.description: The message text to be displayed for this issue

severity.title: Severity
severity.description: The severity level of the issue

title: Rules Configuration
description: A set of rules configuration options for CFLint

rule.title: Rules
rule.description: Allows you to add a plugin for this folder that is not listed in the global configuration

includes.title: Includes

inheritParent.title: Inherit Parent
inheritParent.description: Configures if the rules set in the global or any parent configuration should be inherited as a base set of rules
